mr::matrix Class Reference

Class to represent a matrix in mental ray. More...

#include <mrMatrix.h>

List of all members.

  kInternalToObject, kCameraToWorld, kCameraToObject, kCameraToInternal,

Detailed Description

Class to represent a matrix in mental ray.
